sentence.Network_en: Milkworth and liverwort starred the green slope.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English, from liver + wort, translating medieval Latin hepatica

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous small green nonvascular plants of the class Hepaticopsida growing in wet places and resembling green seaweeds or leafy mosses
